docs.text: Intro Introduction This project can be used as a template/guide for creating a REST API using the FastAPI framework. Checkout the project code: https://github.com/jdglaser/fastapi-example-project Features PostgresSQL for database Asynchronous database connections with Databases Database migrations with Alembic SQLAlchemy Core 2.0 for database interaction JWT auth with refresh tokens - implemented using FastAPIs built-in security features Pipenv for project dependency management Unit testing implemented using pytest
